description: Discharge of Conditions 5 (Bat and Bird Boxes Report) , 7 (Construction and Environmental Management Plan),13 (Tree Protecting Plan) and 16 (Refuse and Recycling)  of planning consent ref P2017/1725/FUL dated 27/03/2018 for the Erection of a two storey extension to existing two storey detached building, to the south east corner of the site fronting Highbury New Park to create additional educational floorspace (213 sqm). The proposal includes alterations to the existing two storey building, including the internal reconfiguration, the windows and external changes including cladding at first floor. The proposal is to provide a new dedicated sixth form centre for Highbury Grove and Samuel Rhodes Secondary Schools, landscaping and other associated works.
decision_conditions: The tree officers (Jon Ryan and Gavin Rees) have requested that they are informed of the date for construction of the crossover,
site_name: City Of London Academy Highbury Grove
